wikipedia_page.main:
Sam Reynolds (born 4 June 1991 in Cuckfield, West Sussex England) is a Professional freeride Mountain biker. Known for his Best Trick award in 2015 Red Bull Rampage event when he did a superman over a 72'ft Canyon Gap. He also later performed a trick the "rock solid" in the same event.
Current Bike Sponsor 
NS Bikes

response: *Best trick: Sam Reynolds (Superman over the Canyon Gap)

Sam Reynolds (born December 13, 1981 in Fortuna, California) is a former American professional soccer player, now a player liaison for PROficient Agency, representing professional soccer players, primarily in the United States and Europe.Reynolds continues in lofty soccer circles
